title: Jawadu
author: Jawadu
created_time: August 13, 2022, 09:54:31 AMLast edit: August 15, 2022, 11:06:02 AM by Jawadu
content: Qi proposed to utilize blockchain technology not only for maintaining a decentralized payment network but also for storing computer code that can be used to power tamper-proof decentralized financial contracts and applications.Learn more about QI Blockchain1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 12 August - 06 October (8 weeks)2. $20,000 worth of QI coins will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with QI Blockchain in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/qiblockchain- Telegram group: https://t.me/HovRonQiblockchain- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/qiblockchain.online- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/QiBlockchain- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/qiblockchain/- Discord: https://discord.gg/ucGSzSp4C3- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxRiEx7ywDyXp3seX8J4DdQ- Github: https://github.com/Qi-Blockchain- Learn more about Qi Blockchain: https://qiblockchain.online/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- QI Bounty: https://t.me/qibounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsCode:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:QI wallet address:$20,000 worth of QI coins tokens will be distributed in this bounty. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Twitter campaign: 25%- Video Campaign:  20- Article campaign: 20%- Facebook campaign: 15%- Instagram campaign: 10%- Reddit campaign: 10%Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the video quality.Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos.- Write a good description about QI Coin in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach QI Coin links in your video description.- Publish your video on YouTube, TikTok, etc.- Only 2 videos per person are allowed.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEESTS Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the article quality.Rules:- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Only English language is accepted in articles.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit [urlhttps://qiblockchain.online/]qiblockchain.online[/url] to learn more about it and write your articles.- Attach QI Coin links in your articles.- Only 2 articles per person are allowed.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEESTS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow QI Coin Twitter account: @qiblockchain3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #qi #qie #foxcampaigns #qiblockchain #web3 #cryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEESTS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow QI Coin Facebook account: @QiBlockchain3. Make 1 post and 1 share, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 posts, 5 reposts)5. Use these hashtags; #qi #qie #foxcampaigns #qiblockchain #web3 #cryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEESTS Code:[ Facebook Report ]Facebook Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1: Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Share Link #1:Share Link #2:Share Link #3:Share Link #4:Share Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 posts, 5 reposts).5.
